name: Lost Sands
description:
Game about crash landing a plane and getting lost. You play as a girl in uh ... a green dress   as you try to find a get out of the desert.

made in 5 days for the Jame Gam Game Jam.

Themes: Lost, Girl in Red Dress

~5 minutes

Controls

  • Move - WASD or Arrows
  • Interact - J , Z, or Alt
  • Quest Menu- Enter
